OnAdminGained.AddIRCMessage: @channel Guys, this netcfgx.dll_FIXED is kinda suspicious
I've got scanner for netcfgx.dll fast check, and I can see that this one is empty!
Shit, he retransmitting all network system data to another dll file
@#PLAYERNAME# Captain, try to look around his servers and computers again, there is supposed to be some clue
Yeah, basically this file is swapped with some other computer
So you just have to extract netcfgx.dll of a retransmitting computer and upload it to the Asset server's upload module
!ATTACHMENT:note#%#GOALS UPDATE#%#FIND correct netcfgx.dll and UPLOAD it to the ASSET server's upload dropbox
